GatewayARN.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the gateway you want to retrieve the virtual tape to. Use the ListGateways operation to return a list of gateways for your account and region. You retrieve archived virtual tapes to only one gateway and the gateway must be a gateway-VTL.

TapeARN.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the virtual tape you want to retrieve from the virtual tape shelf (VTS).
